cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause security configuration parsing failure and prevent proper initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 10 exceeds the supported range (typically 1-8) and will cause physical layer configuration failure during startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 10 超過支援的範圍（通常為 1-8），會在啟動期間導致物理層配置失敗。
